english.segment1: Lord, you live in me. You're my best friend. You're the King of kings. The beginning and end. Now that you have my eyes. I see your spirit inside of me
english.segment2: All that I am is for you. My Savior. I live by your word. And surrender to you. Here where I stand in this moment father. My spirit has been renewed. I surrender to you
english.segment3: You hold the key to my life. In your loving hand. Always by my side. I offer all that I am. So glad I realize. You are the truth and the light. In my life
english.segment4: Everything I need I find in you. I believe your promises are true. I will lift my burdens up to you. Your loving grace will see me through
